naslov: ***Kamena kuća u povijesnoj jezgri grada Korčule*** (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo pri prodaji kamene kuće u samom srcu grada Korčule. Kuća je se sastoji od prizemlja, prvog i drugog kata te potkrovlja. U prizemlju se nalazi kuhinja s blagovaonicom te dnevnim boravkom dok se na prvom i drugom katu te potkrovlju nalaze tri spavaće sobe s kupaonicama. Renovirana je te potpuno namještena i opremljena prema visokim standardima. Nalazi se u srcu povijesne jezgre Korčule, na svega 35 metara od morske obale. Trajektna luka, iz koje polaze linije prema Splitu i otoku Hvaru, udaljena je 270 metara. Marina Korčula udaljena je 400 metara. Nalazi se u neposrednoj blizini rodne kuće Marka Pola. Kuća je u turističkom najmu te ostvaruje odlične prihode. Za više informacija nazvati na +385 95 345 3333 (Marina). 21stCENTURY - profesionalan pristup & provjerene nekretnine NAPOMENA: Agencijska provizija za kupca: 3 % We mediate the sale of a stone house in the very heart of the town of Korčula. The house consists of a ground floor, first and second floors and an attic. On the ground floor there is a kitchen with a dining room and a living room, while on the first and second floors and the attic there are three bedrooms with bathrooms. It has been renovated and fully furnished and equipped according to high standards. It is located in the heart of the historic center of Korčula, only 35 meters from the seashore. The ferry port, from which lines to Split and the island of Hvar depart, is 270 meters away. Marina Korčula is 400 meters away. It is located in the immediate vicinity of Marko Polo's birthplace. The house is rented for tourists and generates excellent income. For more information please contact +385 95 345 3333 (Marina). 21ST CENTURY professional service & verified real estate 21.REAL ESTATE & TOURISM CENTURY d.o.o. www.21stcroatia.com Marmontova 5 21 000 Split CROATIA NOTE: Agency commission for the buyer: 3%
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
